img.title: School closure image
img.style: width: 250px; height: 250px; float: right; margin-bottom: 10px; margin-left: 10px; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.img:
As you know,our schools are closed for the remainder of the 2019/2020 school year, due to the mandatory school shut down issued by Governor Whitmer. Our staff will be working with students through Google Classroom beginning April 20 and has also prepared many links, activities, and resources that students (and you) may utilize during this time off. Please note that these activities will not be graded upon return.
Click here for all of our School Closure Information
If you need technical support with your district chromebook, connecting to google, or you are in need of your student's Google ID and password please email helpdesk@lamphereschools.org with details and contact information and a member of our Technology Team will assist.

div.span: We love our Lamphere family and care about the safety and well being of all! Please take care, and feel free to use any and all of these provided resources.

span.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(136, 136, 136);

a.title: Lamphere Schools 6-12 Continuity of Learning Plan

br.a: Lamphere Schools 6-12 Continuity of Learning Plan

div.div: We are aware that many families may be experiencing a reduction or loss of income due to the pandemic closures in our community & State. Please know that the Lamphere School District continues to accept applications for free/reduced meal benefits until June.
VIEW MORE About Michigan Pandemic EBT Program

Lamphere Schools will participate in limited Schools of Choice for the 2nd Semester of the 2019/2020 school year. The enrollment period will take place January 14 - 27, 2020 Contact us today to enroll your student: Phone: (248) 589-1990 ext. 2012 Email: schraubl@lamphereschools.org
VIEW MORE About Make Lamphere Your Choice

a.title: Lamphere Announces FREE Breakfast for all students

img.alt: Lamphere Announces FREE Breakfast for all students

div.div: Lamphere Announces FREE Breakfast for all students
Lamphere Schools will participate in the Oakland County “Better with Breakfast” program providing all students with a healthy school breakfast, beginning this school year on September 3.
VIEW MORE About Lamphere Announces FREE Breakfast for all students
In 2016, the Michigan Legislature passed a law that requires schools to identify learners who are struggling with reading and writing and to provide additional help.
VIEW MORE About Read by Grade Three
Lamphere Schools will offer Junior Kindergarten in our elementary schools and two new electives at Lamphere High School beginning with the 2019/2020 school year.
VIEW MORE About Lamphere Announces New Curriculum Choices
Hiller Elementary has been nationally recognized for student success in 2018
VIEW MORE About Hiller Receives National Recognition

The Lamphere School District is committed to creating a healthy school environment that enhances the development of lifelong wellness practices to promote healthy eating and physical activities that support student achievement.
